## NumberRangeMatcher type

Matcher values for a filter with a $between [Matcher](./answers-core.matcher.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NumberRangeMatcher = Matcher.GreaterThan | Matcher.GreaterThanOrEqualTo | Matcher.LessThan | Matcher.LessThanOrEqualTo;
```
